issue.title: [Ruby][MSYS2] libparquet needs to be installed in MSYS2 for ruby
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5055](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5055). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
MSYS2 doesn't include the parquet libraries so cannot use red-parquet which uses gobject-introspection against libparquet

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5055?focusedCommentId=16853423) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
0.14.0 includes Parquet support with MinGW build.
We can close this when 0.14.0 is released and https://github.com/msys2/MINGW-packages/blob/master/mingw-w64-arrow/PKGBUILD is updated.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5055?focusedCommentId=16880027) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Parquet support has been merged: https://github.com/msys2/MINGW-packages/pull/5593
